title: Practical Competency Enhancement Through Scientific Explanation Modeling in Earthquake Education

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic earth science and disaster management concepts
context.additional_context: Practical Earth Science Education for On-the-Job Application by Current Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain earthquake generation mechanisms by transitioning from static to dynamic models.
Learners can analyze earthquake cause-effect relationships in three stages (description, relationship, causality) based on scientific evidence.
Learners can propose earthquake prevention and citizen-level response strategies by applying them to real-world situations.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
